curam.client.util.convert

Class CurrencySymbol

  • java.lang.Object
    • curam.util.common.plugin.AbstractPlugIn
      • curam.util.common.domain.AbstractDomainPlugIn

              • curam.client.util.convert.CurrencySymbol
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    curam.util.client.domain.convert.ClientDomainConverter, DomainConverter, DomainPlugIn, PlugIn

    public class CurrencySymbol
extends SvrMoneyConverter
    Converter that supports the use of a currency symbol for money values.

    • Method Detail

      • format

        public java.lang.String format(java.lang.Object amount)
                        throws ConversionException
        A converter for the CURAM_AMOUNT domain and its derivatives.
        A currency symbol character as defined in the DomainPluginConfig CurrencySymbol entry is appended to the money amount. The placement of the symbol is also defined in the entry and can have a value of before or after. However if the application property "curam.financial.localizedcurrencysymbolplacement" is enabled, then the symbol placement and amount is formatted according to the user's locale.
        Specified by:
        format in interface DomainConverter
        Overrides:
        format in class SvrMoneyConverter
        Parameters:
        amount - The curam money amount.
        Returns:
        A string containing the curam money amount with the attached currency symbol. * @throws ConversionException if data conversion error occurs.
        Throws:
        ConversionException - If the formatting fails.
        See Also:
        DomainConverter.format(Object)

      • parse

        public java.lang.Object parse(java.lang.String amount)
                       throws ConversionException
        A parser for the CURAM_AMOUNT domain and its derivatives.
        This method should remove any of the additional formatting added by the format method such as a currency symbol character, before the data is saved.
        Specified by:
        parse in interface DomainConverter
        Overrides:
        parse in class SvrMoneyConverter
        Parameters:
        amount - The formatted curam money amount.
        Returns:
        The curam money amount with any additional formatting removed. * * @throws ConversionException if data conversion error occurs.
        Throws:
        ConversionException - If the parsing fails.
